column1: Smoque BBQ////Perhaps my expectations were too high
column2: but I had hoped for a better dining experience. With painted concrete floor and metal roof ceiling
column3: the crowded restaurant was loud and difficult to carry on a conversation. Although a patron standing in line interrupted our meal to ask about the french fries. Barry
column5: stopped by to ask how everything was. He was friendly and proud of his food and spoke about their efforts to maintain consistency.
